languages.text: {n}Даже в неверном свете люменов вы замечаете нечто странное — легкое смещение пропорций, едва уловимую ассиметрию черт. Взглянув на других стражников, вы подмечаете ту же особенность и в их лицах — как и то, что почти у всех присутствуют странные, явно не боевые и весьма ветхие импланты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Даже в неверном свете люменов вы замечаете нечто странное — легкое смещение пропорций, едва уловимую ассиметрию черт. Бросив взгляд на других стражников, вы подмечаете ту же особенность и в их лицах.{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Даже в неверном свете люменов вы замечаете нечто странное — легкое смещение пропорций, едва уловимую ассиметрию черт. Взглянув на других стражников, вы подмечаете ту же особенность и в их лицах — как и то, что почти у всех присутствуют странные, явно не боевые и весьма ветхие импланты.{/n}

Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}即便是在昏黄的灯光之下，你也注意到了某些不自然的东西。她面部的比例不太对劲，五官也出现了几乎无法察觉的不对称。你转过头，看着其他哨兵，发现他们的脸也同样怪异。此外，这些人脸上都戴着破烂不堪的古怪植入物，这些东西显然不是用来辅助战斗的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}即便是在昏黄的灯光之下，你也注意到了某些不自然的东西。她面部的比例不太对劲，五官也出现了几乎无法察觉的不对称。你转过头，看着其他哨兵，发现他们的脸也同样怪异。此外，这些人脸上都戴着破烂不堪的古怪植入物，这些东西显然不是用来辅助战斗的。{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}Incluso bajo los titilantes lumens, percibes algo extraño: las proporciones ligeramente desiguales, la asimetría casi imposible de discernir en su rostro... Al mirar a otros guardias, ves la misma peculiaridad en sus caras, junto con el detalle de que todos llevan el mismo tipo de implantes extraños y destartalados que, evidentemente, no son auméticos de combate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incluso bajo los titilantes lumens, percibes algo extraño: las proporciones ligeramente desiguales, la asimetría casi imposible de discernir en su rostro... Al mirar a otros guardias, ves la misma peculiaridad en sus caras, junto con el detalle de que todos llevan el mismo tipo de implantes extraños y destartalados que, evidentemente, no son auméticos de combate.{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}揺れるルーメンの下でさえ、あなたは何か奇妙なことに気づく…わずかに歪んだプロポーション、ほとんど気づかない程度の彼女の顔の非対称性。他の見張りを見てみると、彼らの顔にも同じ奇妙さがうかがえる。そして、彼ら全員が同様に、おかしな壊れそうなインプラントを装着している。これは明らかに戦闘オーグメティックではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}揺れるルーメンの下でさえ、あなたは何か奇妙なことに気づく…わずかに歪んだプロポーション、ほとんど気づかない程度の彼女の顔の非対称性。他の見張りを見てみると、彼らの顔にも同じ奇妙さがうかがえる。そして、彼ら全員が同様に、おかしな壊れそうなインプラントを装着している。これは明らかに戦闘オーグメティックではない。{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}Même sous les lumens vacillants, vous remarquez quelque chose d'étrange : les proportions légèrement faussées, l'asymétrie presque indiscernable de ses traits. Vous observez la même singularité chez les autres sentinelles. En outre, elles portent toutes les mêmes étranges implants rudimentaires qui ne sont clairement pas des augmétiques de combat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Même sous les lumens vacillants, vous remarquez quelque chose d'étrange : les proportions légèrement faussées, l'asymétrie presque indiscernable de ses traits. Vous observez la même singularité chez les autres sentinelles. En outre, elles portent toutes les mêmes étranges implants rudimentaires qui ne sont clairement pas des augmétiques de combat.{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}Selbst im flackernden Licht der Lumen fällt dir etwas Merkwürdiges auf – die leicht verzogenen Proportionen, die fast unsichtbare Asymmetrie ihrer Gesichtszüge. Ein Blick auf die anderen Wachen zeigt, dass sie dasselbe Phänomen in ihren Gesichtern aufweisen – und sie tragen alle die gleichen provisorischen Implantate, die ganz eindeutig keine Kampfaugmentationen sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Selbst im flackernden Licht der Lumen fällt dir etwas Merkwürdiges auf – die leicht verzogenen Proportionen, die fast unsichtbare Asymmetrie ihrer Gesichtszüge. Ein Blick auf die anderen Wachen zeigt, dass sie dasselbe Phänomen in ihren Gesichtern aufweisen – und sie tragen alle die gleichen provisorischen Implantate, die ganz eindeutig keine Kampfaugmentationen sind.{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: {n}Titreşen lümenlerin altındayken bile bir tuhaflık fark ediyorsun: Hafifçe yamulmuş yüz unsurları ve neredeyse fark edilemez orandaki asimetri. Diğer nöbetçilere baktığında, onların yüzünde de aynı tuhaflığı görüyorsun. Ayrıca hepsinin de çatışma ogmetiği olmadığı belli olan, aynı tuhaf, külüstür implantlardan taktığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even under the wavering lumens, you notice something strange — the slightly skewed proportions, the almost indiscernible asymmetry of her facial features. Looking at the other sentries, you see the same oddity in their faces too — and the fact that they are all wearing the same strange, ramshackle implants, which clearly are not combat augmetics.{/n}

Diğer nöbetçilere baktığında, onların yüzünde de aynı tuhaflığı görüyorsun. Ayrıca hepsinin de çatışma ogmetiği olmadığı belli olan, aynı tuhaf, külüstür implantlardan taktığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
